title: LoopBack 3.0 Query Parameters
description: Query parameters for `Model.find()` etc. as well as model `scopes`. Fields, limit, order, etc.  http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Querying-data

objectInclude.description: A map of related models (key) and sub-includes (value)

stringOrder.description: order by a single property. Must specify `ASC` or `DESC`.```"order_date ASC""name DESC"```

whereObject.description: Specify search criteria; similar to a WHERE clause in SQL. ```"field":"value" // equals condition (field = value)"field":{"gt":5}// condition OBJECT specifying `gt`,`lt`,`neq`, etc."or":[{"field":/*condition*/}],{"field":/*condition*/}] // or clause with 2 or more conditions"and":[[{"field":/*condition*/}],{"field":/*condition*/}]] // and clause with 2 or more conditions```@see http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Where-filter

gt.description: Numerical greater than (>). Valid only for numerical and date values.For Geopoint values, the units are in miles by default.@see http://apidocs.strongloop.com/loopback-datasource-juggler/#geopoint

gte.description: Numerical greater than or equal (>=). Valid only for numerical and date values.For Geopoint values, the units are in miles by default.@see http://apidocs.strongloop.com/loopback-datasource-juggler/#geopoint

lt.description: Numerical less than (<). Valid only for numerical and date values.For Geopoint values, the units are in miles by default.@see http://apidocs.strongloop.com/loopback-datasource-juggler/#geopoint

lte.description: Numerical less than or equal (<). Valid only for numerical and date values.For Geopoint values, the units are in miles by default.@see http://apidocs.strongloop.com/loopback-datasource-juggler/#geopoint

between.description: True if the value is between the two specified values: greater than or equal to first value and less than or equal to second value.For geolocation values, the units are in miles by default. @see http://apidocs.strongloop.com/loopback-datasource-juggler/#geopoint

nin.description: NOT IN an array of values.

near.description: For geolocations, return the closest points, sorted in order of distance. ```"near":"32.324,72.01"```Use with `limit` to return the `n` closest points.

like.description: LIKE operator for use with regular expressions. The regular expression format depends on the backend data source.```"title" : {	"like": "M.+st"}```

nlike.description: NOT LIKE operator for use with regular expressions. The regular expression format depends on the backend data source.```"title" : {	"nlike": "DRAFT.+"}```

fields.description: Specifies properties (fields) to include or exclude from the results.By default, queries return all model properties in results.  However, if you specify at least one fields filter with a value of true, then by default the query will include *only* those you specifically include with filters.@see http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Fields-filter

additionalProperties.description: Name of a field to include or remove:`{ fields: {id: true, make: true, model: true} }`

include.description: An include filter enables you to include results from related models in a query, for example models that have `belongsTo` or `hasMany` relations, to optimize the number of requests.@see http://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Include-filter

limit.description: Limit the number of instances to return.

order.description: An order filter specifies how to sort the results: ascending (ASC) or descending (DESC) based on the specified property.

skip.description: Skip the specified number of instances.
